news.title: Mavi and Niontay Link Up for New Song and Video: Watch
news.summary: “Jammers Anonymous” is the latest in Mavi’s prolific string of collaborative tracks

news.title: FKA twigs and Shia LaBeouf Settle Assault and Sexual Battery Lawsuit
news.summary: The musician claimed that LaBeouf subjected her to “relentless abuse” during the course of their relationship. The actor has denied allegations of wrongdoing.

news.title: New Jim Jarmusch, Yorgos Lanthimos, Noah Baumbach, and Luca Guadagnino Films to Premiere at Venice Film Festival
news.summary: Also premiering are features from Benny Safdie, Gus Van Sant, Park Chan-wook, and Kathryn Bigelow; documentaries from Sofia Coppola, Werner Herzog, and Lucrecia Martel; and a Charlie Kaufman short

news.title: Ryan Davis & the Roadhouse Band Announce Tour, Share Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: “Better If You Make Me” is the final preview of the upcoming album New Threats From the Soul

news.title: The Weeknd and Shakira to Headline Global Citizen Festival 2025
news.summary: Tyla, Ayra Starr, and Mariah the Scientist will also perform at the New York festival in September

news.title: Cate Le Bon Shares Video for New Song “Is It Worth It (Happy Birthday)?”: Watch
news.summary: From Le Bon’s forthcoming album Michelangelo Dying

news.title: Mac DeMarco Shares Video for New Song “Holy”: Watch
news.summary: It’s the second preview of the upcoming album Guitar
